lexUnit.name: canyon.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a deep gorge, especially one with a river flowing through it.

sentence.text: He was drugged , bundled into the boot of a car and driven to a canyon on the outskirts of Santiago .
They wintered in the lush lowlands of canyons on the Grande Ronde and Imnaha valleys , wandering up Joseph Creek in the spring to harvest kouse on the higher meadows .
Then , abruptly , for the following day and a half there was neither sand nor palm trees , just a thirty-mile climb up a canyon of broken slate and rock .
The canyon ran parallel to the continuation of the wadi which I had been following for days .
As we climbed up the canyon we made a great clatter with sticks and stones and old tin cans , announcing our presence to the denizens .
They moved into the first , pitch black canyon , faintly lit by a Poacher 's Moon , their passage marked by the persistent bleeping of the detector .
I know its London shrieks and shuffles as it rushes through road canyons and around the sharp edges of tall buildings .
You 'll see mountains and canyons carved over hundreds of thousands of years from the underlying sandstone .
Discover the many parks , valleys and canyons , the five botanical gardens and the eerie caves at Haena .
Cautiously setting out to explore the many winding canyons debouching from their landing point , a host of nightmarish apparitions greet their progress .
Meanwhile , Powell is off trying to survey the goddamn Grand Canyon , hiking up the side canyons , taking his frickin' measurements .
The motorspeeder had entered a canyon at least a mile wide .
For a few weeks in mid-winter , the steel-blue waters of the Zanskar river freeze into a seventy mile ice passageway winding through a deep canyon in the remote mountains of the northern Himalaya .
For example , the Congo , which virtually debouches into a submarine canyon , has no delta .
He did not have time to check his mirrors for police cars as he passed All Hallows-on-the-Wall and plunged into the long straight canyon of London Wall .
She saw a dark , circular shape rising from the depths , ascending the sides of the canyon .
